author: Flash88
title: Offside!
review:
I really liked these goals. The netting was made very well, and naturally the LEGO provided a sturdy frame. Sometimes it would be awkward for the netting to rest properly, but this didn't create too many problems. 

Good build factor here. The goals did stay together well even when stored away. If you were to build/re-build each time you wanted to play, would be a little bit time consuming I guess.

If there was one thing a LEGO figure's hand was made for, it was holding the flag. The referee and linesman are simply added "extras" which add to the realism of your game. They aren't needed, but they are there, and are simple enough.
